contentfulProduct.seoDescription: A flattering design and silhouette, these pants are equally comfy and versatile. High-waisted with an ultra-soft feel, they're perfect to be worn with long sweaters out and about or just lounging around the house.
contentfulProduct.title: Ultra-Stretch Ponte Ankle Legging

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

A flattering design and silhouette, these pants are equally comfy and versatile. High-waisted with an ultra-soft feel, they're perfect to be worn with long sweaters out and about or just lounging around the house.
4-way stretch fabric designed to provide all-day comfort and supportive feel
Wrinkle-resistant
Inseam: 25"
Front Rise: 10", Back Rise: 14.25" (size Small)
Faux front pockets and functional back pockets
Pull-on style with contoured flat elasticized waistband
No sheerness
Material: 67% Rayon, 28% Nylon, 5% Spandex
Materials aren't treated with pesticides or fertilizers and conserve more natural resources like water
Origin: Seoul, Korea
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small
Machine Wash

productDetails.productDetails:
• 4-way stretch fabric designed to provide all-day comfort and supportive feel
  • Wrinkle-resistant
  • Inseam: 25"
  • Front Rise: 10", Back Rise: 14.25" (size Small)
  • Faux front pockets and functional back pockets
  • Pull-on style with contoured flat elasticized waistband
  • No sheerness
  • Material: 67% Rayon, 28% Nylon, 5% Spandex
  • Materials aren't treated with pesticides or fertilizers and conserve more natural resources like water
  • Origin: Seoul, Korea
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small

productDescription.productDescription: A flattering design and silhouette, these pants are equally comfy and versatile. High-waisted with an ultra-soft feel, they're perfect to be worn with long sweaters out and about or just lounging around the house.

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! Its now a reality  in 10 colors  thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to selldirectto the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like Im Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
